author: rbb
msg: Move filename_of_pathname down to APR.  I have put an ap_ at the beginning
to protect namespace.  This is "distilled" from http_main.c

author: rbb
msg: I am actually going to fix the recursive lock contention this time.
These locks were removed when Dean did his NSPR work a long time ago,
and were carried over into the apache-apr tree.  When the lib directory
was created for APR though, it was created from the 1.3 tree, which still
had these locks.  This removes them, hopefully for good.  I have tested
the server, and it appears to serve pages again, but as always, YMMV

author: rbb
msg: Fix my ap_make_iovec function.  APR compiles cleanly again.  I could have
sworn this compiled for me last night, but I must have been mistaken.

author: bjh
msg: OS/2: Some cleaning up for file_io.

author: bjh
msg: OS/2: Use the (slightly tweaked) unix start.c instead of our own.
